pr_title: Make price providers cmdline param more readable

timeline.message: Make price providers cmdline param more readable

timeline.bodyText:
I've always wanted to rename this option. Improving the description is a fine start.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            parser.accepts(PROVIDERS, "List custom price providers")
          
          
            
                            parser.accepts(PROVIDERS, "List custom pricenodes")
timeline.author: cbeams

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/common/src/main/java/bisq/common/config/Config.java b/common/src/main/java/bisq/common/config/Config.java
index 4668ff7807..34928a1019 100644
--- a/common/src/main/java/bisq/common/config/Config.java
+++ b/common/src/main/java/bisq/common/config/Config.java

@@ -373,7 +373,7 @@ public class Config {
                         .defaultsTo(false);
 
         ArgumentAcceptingOptionSpec<String> providersOpt =
-                parser.accepts(PROVIDERS, "List custom price providers")
+                parser.accepts(PROVIDERS, "List custom pricenodes")
                         .withRequiredArg()
                         .withValuesSeparatedBy(',')
                         .describedAs("host:port[,...]");
